quotes.mastertext: You can do hard things! Use the Force!
quotes.yodatext: Do hard things, you can! The Force you shall use.

quotes.mastertext: I believe in you, young padawan. Trust in your training.
quotes.yodatext: Believe in you I do, young padawan. Trust in your training, you must.

quotes.mastertext: Have patience. When you move too quickly, you miss what's right in front of you.
Breathe in. Breathe out. What do you notice, padawan?
quotes.yodatext: Take a deep breath. Notice something new, you may.

quotes.mastertext: You must unlearn what you have learned. See through Shoshin, or Beginner's Mind
quotes.yodatext: You must unlearn what you have learned. Use your Shoshin.

quotes.mastertext: You are a luminous being, capable of anything!
quotes.yodatext: A luminous being are you. Capable of anything are you

quotes.mastertext: Growth is growth, no matter how small.
quotes.yodatext: Growth is grown, how small matters not.

quotes.mastertext: Empty space is not nothing; it is a powerful something. Learn to see it!
quotes.yodatext: Nothing empty space is it; A powerful something it is. Learn to see it, you must.

quotes.mastertext: Your fear must be named before you can banish it.
quotes.yodatext: Named your fear must be before banish it you can.
